# PlayerIdentifier

**Structure**

A unique identifier for players.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PlayerIdentifier
```

## Overview

A player identifier is unique across all instances of the same tabletop game.

## Creating player identifiers

- **init(uuid:)**: Creates a player identifier.

## Getting identifier values

- **uuid**: A universally unique value to identify a player.

## Players

- **Player**: A player in a tabletop game.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
